Blog.post: Yo! Rappers all around the world. The new stars have been born. And I'm sure they're gonna rock this world and turn it upside down. They r THE RAP GANG. And they r no ordinary rappers. And they cannot be defeated. They r:- Mangal Danny Tony Roshan Ashil John Ben Sebastian

Yes it's true! The web slinging crime fighting hero is back in business with a new rival; Doc OCK. Hey if u want some action, comedy and some ROMANCE u better start making up ur savings. And there is no hurry 'coz this neighbourhood hero isn't go off that easily. But don't miss the action and get going!

Its back again and with a bang. I am talkin abt spiderman2. i've seen it and it rocks. its like a love-story,comdedy and action all packed up in one movie. The stunts rock and it will amaze you and everytime u see spidey u will be cheering for him and he will send a chill down your spine. I recommend all of you to see the movie. i give it 5*****
